name: Daneyy ❤️
greetingText: Your friendship means a lot to me!🥳
wishText:
In the quiet corners of my heart,
your presence is a tender whisper of 
warmth and solace💖. 
You Dane❤️, are the gentle embrace🤗
in my life's journey, Thank You⭐.
I wish you love, hope and 
everlasting joy and happiness🎉
Thank you for being my best friend ❤️
